Villa Maly
8.4 Excellent
Based on 362 reviews

A fantastic stay and the batteries were fully recharged upon leaving! The surroundings and service were hard to fault and we will definitely stay here when we return.

And we will return as we loved the place!

Show more
CHRIS MACE , New Zealand
S Park Design Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 636 reviews

The hotel was great with friendly and helpful staff. They provided free refreshments to guests on Christmas and the manager was even kind enough to drive me to the airport.

Will definitely stay here again when in Vientiane.

Show more
Paul Sirban , United States
Luang Prabang View Hotel
8.3 Excellent
Based on 180 reviews

we booked a stay here for 2 nights and ended up staying 5, it was that great. the superior rooms have incredible views of the luang prabang town and valley.

the sunsets are beautiful. the infinity pool is the nicest pool i've ever seen. the staff is extremely helpful. each day the room cleaning staff would get our room into pristine condition and refill the complimentary minibar. the breakfasts were delicious! try the french toast, the eggs florentine, and the eggs benedict. the shuttle bus into town was very convenient. we also used the bikes which were fun.

Show more
John Yunits , United States
Kiridara Hotel
8.6 Excellent
Based on 327 reviews

We stayed here for 2 nights and loves Kiridara! Rooms were beautiful-we were there in low season so they upgraded us to a room with a lovely pool view.

Breakfast was wonderful, as was the staff. Infinity pool with gorgeous sunset views. If you're going to splurge, do it here!

Show more
Kelley Lowes , United States
Xaysomboun Boutique Hotel & Spa
8 Very good
Based on 311 reviews

Good location great staff very friendly and helpfull good breakfast the rooms are spacious and clean I recomend this hotel to my friends next visit to vientian it will be my stay

Abdulrahim Fakhroo , Bahrain
Victoria Xiengthong Palace
8.9 Excellent
Based on 421 reviews

We visited Xiengthong_Palace Luang_Prabag with our relatives, booked two rooms. My room has two stories, with an in room Jacuzzi.

All 4 of us rented the hotel’s bamboo bicycles instead walking to town center, many others took photos of the bamboo bikes. The hotel staffs went out off their way as our friends (not as their jobs). We had breakfasts and a dinner at hotel which we enjoyed very much.

Show more
Prithep Sosothikul , Thailand
Seng Tawan Riverside Hotel
7.3 Very good
Based on 1006 reviews

We had a pleasant 3 nights there - booked for 2 nights in advance, and added an extra night - extra few dollars for the larger "superior" room was well worth it, for two people sharing.

Very central for riverside walking and dining.

Show more
Vija Hughes , Australia
Landmark Mekong Riverside Hotel
8.3 Excellent
Based on 153 reviews

Great

Kriengkrai Lertsirisamphan , Thailand
Rashmi's Plaza Hotel Vientiane
7.7 Very good
Based on 587 reviews

As always good! We love th quality of the bed it´s in crédible. The staff and the food

Mike Chille , Switzerland
Silver Naga Hotel
7.6 Very good
Based on 700 reviews

Pleasant and relaxing

Malvinas Khemtongpru , Thailand
Maison Souvannaphoum Hotel
8.9 Excellent
Based on 267 reviews

I found this hotel was very soothing with wonderful gardens, very pleasant helpful staff at all times .

. and would definitely return to stay there in Luang Prabang

Show more
Walter MacFarlane , United Kingdom
Salana Boutique Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 1159 reviews

We stayed here twice in 2013 and it was so nice we decided easily to stay again this year. This is such a well run hotel, excellent amenities, gracious professional staff and all the amenities.

And the food is top notch.

Show more
Mark Chambers , United States
The Apsara Rive Droite Hotel
9 Excellent
Based on 54 reviews

The hotel staff could not do more for us. This was our second visit. It is in a charming location over the river from town but they have their own boat to take you across any time of day.

Luang Prabang is such a peaceful, spiritual location and this is a small oasis that adds to the experience. Thanks to all the staff, especially Han, the deputy manager. We would stay here every time.

Show more
Nicholas West , United Kingdom
Maison Dalabua Luangprabang Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 538 reviews

Excellent breakfast quality. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They took care of our family very well and were able to provide a baby cot for our smallest child.

The room comfortably fit the double bed, an extra bed, and the baby cot. Beware the free bicycles as they are in poor condition. The pedals are broken on several of the bikes and only one had decent brakes.

Show more
Justin Boggs , United States
Muong Thanh Luxury Vientiane
7.9 Very good
Based on 94 reviews

One of the best hotel in town, it got everything you can expect from a 5 star hotel next to the thai ambassy and sinook cafe i will back here again

Thibaud Derache , France
Sabaidee@Lao Hotel Vientiane
8 Very good
Based on 905 reviews

I had a wonderful stay. I certainly recommend it

Cheyne Slater , Australia
The Belle Rive Boutique Hotel
9 Excellent
Based on 468 reviews

view , breakfast, room

AIKO MIZUTORI , Japan
Vang vieng Centralpark hotel
8.5 Excellent
Based on 254 reviews

Such a good value and the perfect location for exploring Vang Vieng. I recommend it!

Jason Kinney , United States
Don Chan Palace Hotel & Convention
7.2 Very good
Based on 471 reviews

Fabulous and splendid! I think that this hotel is the best in this city! What i love the most is the assistance of staffs.

They are really informative and helpful!

Show more
Surachai Rodngam , Thailand
Le Sen Boutique Hotel
9 Excellent
Based on 431 reviews

The staff could not be any nicer, always greeted with good manners and smiles. Located in a quite area, but close to downtown, also offers shuttle bus every 30 mins to downtown.

Pool was very clean, room was beautiful and spotless with a gentle scent. Breakfast was served hot, buffet style with many choices. The best hotel I've stayed in during this Laos trip. Would love love love to visit again. Definitely five

Show more
Ji Young Kim , South Korea
Azerai Luang Prabang
9.8 Exceptional
Based on 15 reviews

Mekong Riverview Hotel
9.2 Exceptional
Based on 177 reviews

Fantastic

matthew quigley , United States
Hemera Hotel
7.7 Very good
Based on 753 reviews

Over the road from the market so you have access to everything you need Staff are friendly which is hard to find in Laos.

I will be booking again when my visa needs renewing. Breakfast was very good. Rooms were very clean. awesome stay thank you i will be back.

Show more
Neville Woollen , Thailand
Best Western Vientiane Hotel
7.8 Very good
Based on 630 reviews

location, comfort, service

Ma Katrina Victoria Avellana , Philippines
Lao Golden Hotel
7.3 Very good
Based on 576 reviews

Reasonable price, room is clean. We feel relax when staying in this hotel.

Soudaphone Khomthavong , Laos
Lotus Villa Hotel
8.8 Excellent
Based on 712 reviews

Beautiful rooms and very clean. Staff nice and helpful, good breakfast.Walking distance to most places of interest.

Show more
Vanessa Monro , United Kingdom
Villa Santi Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 463 reviews

Comfortable clean Kind People, I was Enjoyed my trip. That location is perfect. I am very thankful there help.

Jung Bin KIM , South Korea
The River Resort
9.3 Exceptional
Based on 154 reviews

The River Resort was a complete surprise I never expected it to be so magnificent. The staff are superb smily, extremely helpful.

The view is speactacular, the surroundings of the room are so peaceful. I have lived in Asia for 4 years and travelled non stop and River Resort was surely the best hotel stay I have experienced. I only have one regret I only booked one night!!

Show more
Maria Benz , United Kingdom
The Grand Luang Prabang
7.9 Very good
Based on 256 reviews

the hotel was wonderfull. the rooms were good with view over mekong. the pool was excellent. the staff were very friendly.

the egg chef in the morning was especially helpfull. if i return to luang prabang i would definately use this hotel again.

Show more
Rita Kinghorn , United Kingdom
Vang Vieng Boutique Hotel
7.9 Very good
Based on 572 reviews

I think the best guesthouse for this price! Location, cleanliness, service......everything was fantastic! They recomand local tour programs and bus tickets to another city so you don't need searching for them.

Don't miss local noodle restaurant near here(go straight on the right from hotel, there're two noodle restaurants on the right. The second one(bigger one) is the place. Also, dumplings a man sells on the bike in the morning are amazing! You'd better try it!!

Show more
hyunhye Joo , South Korea
Riverside Boutique Resort
8.9 Excellent
Based on 629 reviews

Wonderful

Barbara Stevenson , United Kingdom
Vieng Tara Villa
8.1 Excellent
Based on 423 reviews

Enjoy the amazing nature view here!

zhuo xu , China
My Dream Boutique Resort
8.9 Excellent
Based on 919 reviews

Everything about our stay here was perfect from the moment we were picked up from the airport. The staff was more than helpful at all times, very accommodating, and extremely friendly! The rooms and grounds of the resort were absolutely gorgeous- could not have asked for a better stay.

We extended our stay and wish we could have stayed even longer!

Show more
Alyssa Rydell , United States
Thavonsouk Resort
7.5 Very good
Based on 896 reviews

we loved our stay at thavonsouk resort, stayed in a riverview room, was not disappointed. sublime views.

Aluna and James really know the hospitality industry and made what would have been a pleasant stay, an exceptional one.

Show more
robyn britton , Australia
Vang Vieng Sunrise View Resort
7.1 Very good
Based on 209 reviews

We had a very enjoyable stay at Phongsavanh Resort. All the staff were friendlly and very eager to please.

The room, dining area & hammocks & balconies were all picturesque, comfortable and very inviting. We booked tours and our bus through the resort as well as having laundry done. Experienced above-average service for all. Remy went out of his way to make sure everything was just right. He even asked if we liked the music playing in the common area. The morning coffee was a treat we looked forward to, as was the terrific breakfast. Although the resort is a short walk from the 'action', that was our preference. Very peaceful, yet tours and buses come to the resort to pick you up. Very convenient. We highly recommend staying here while in Vang Vieng.

Show more
Frank Sobkowicz , Canada
Villa Vang Vieng Riverside
7.3 Very good
Based on 421 reviews

If U like nature and wood then this is the place to be in Vang Vieng...rooms made of wood surrounded by trees and flowers, beautiful swimming pool and a fantastic view of the river and mountains.

Ronaldo Alejandro Howlin , Argentina
Chanthavinh Resort and Spa
7.4 Very good
Based on 195 reviews

Charming slightly dippy manager. and staff really helpful and kind - nothing too much trouble- easy access into town - in fact pleasant to cross the river and be driven in just about anytime you like.

They advertise "spa" but don't have one and should in due course and build a pool then the price will go up and Luang Prabang's best kept secret will be over >they do have a fab location on the river and super gardens.

Show more
simon browne , United Kingdom
Villa Santi Resort & Spa
7.9 Very good
Based on 143 reviews

after booking the villa santi resort we read a negative review and so were concerned we had made a mistake but from pick up at the airport and through out our whole stay we were very impressed.

we had a juniour suite, very spacious and clean, which overlooked the rice paddies and a village in the distance. we walked through the vegetable gardens to the village, nice to be away from the humdrum of luang prabang central.in the restaurant i had the best soup i have ever tasted the spicy chicken soup, exquisite stock, we had meals in town and at the resort, overall we thought the resort to be the best value.the pool was clean and refreshing, laying out there reading, over looking the gardens and paddies was so peaceful, relaxing and refreshing. the staff were friendly and helpful and there were free mini buses into town if you wanted them.we were very impressed and would certainly stay there again.

Show more
Christie Dickenson , Australia
Villa Nam Song
7.7 Very good
Based on 172 reviews

This small boutique hotel is a gem on the edge of the river Nam Song. Step outside the gate and a boat tour awaits you for a wonderful ride along the river.

I went on walks but found my self coming back to the Villa to sit and enjoy the garden and view of the mountains. The staff is polite and the gardner has done a superb job with his plants. The owner is on site and helpful and the dining area is another wonderful spot to sit and watch the river pass by. By far one of my favorite places I have stayed. I felt safe as a singe woman traveler and that's very important to me. I would recommend Villa Nam Song as I myself will return as often as I possible!

Show more
Jinni Mitchell , United States
Lao Spirit Resort
9 Excellent
Based on 98 reviews

We stayed for 3 nights and did two treks and elephant riding. with a local english speaking guide arranged by the hotel.

The treks were absolutley wonderful, visiting villages, seeing masses of butterflies, local farms and animals. The guide was very very good and took the trouble to tell us a lot about the local people and farming. The hotel itself is more like an old fashioned colonial house, with low-key service from friendly local staff who are keen to improve their English and provide as good a service as they could. The food was excellent and the rooms were larger than we had expected, spotlessly clean and very comfortable. We had a verandah overlooking the river and up into the mountains. The traditional Thai massage was the best ever, done by a local girl on our verandah. This is a fantastic place and all the better for providing employment and opportunity for local people.

Show more

Sanctuary Nam Ngum Beach Resort

Based on 37 reviews

Namkat Yolapa Resort
8.9 Excellent
Based on 19 reviews

Savanh Sunset View Resort

Nong Kiau Riverside Resort

Excellent

Sanctuary Pakbeng Lodge
8.4 Excellent
Based on 61 reviews

We were very surprised by how well kept the hotel was. A very beautiful location with a great view. the staff is very friendly and the service excellent.

Would highly recommend this place.

Show more
Stijn Christiaan Vissers , Netherlands
Nam Ou Riverside Resort
8.5 Excellent
Based on 113 reviews

This is the best resort I had stayed.Perfect manager,perfect staffs,perfect rooms.They are very nice.

if you want to relax,it's the best resort.

Show more
JIANFENG HEI , China
Mandala Ou Resort
10 Exceptional
Based on 3 reviews

Belmond La Résidence Phou Vao
9.2 Exceptional
Based on 45 reviews

This hotel is amazing! We had a Garden View Junior Suite and the view over the town / mountains – including the Mount Phousi temple – was wonderful.

The room was massive with a lovely bath and private balcony, the bed was decorated with flowers on arrival and the nightly turn-down with Macaroons was a nice touch. We ate at the restaurant every night and the food and buffet breakfast were excellent. Of course the hotel is a bit out of town, but really there is no reason to leave the hotel (and the hotel shuttle bus is free and convenient). The spa lived up to its reputation – exceptional menu and the massages were great. Oh, and the infinity pool is lovely!

Show more
Danielle Larkin , Australia
Khaimkhong River Views Resort
8 Very good
Based on 10 reviews

Long Ngum View Resort
5.9 Review score
Based on 44 reviews

so good location , see sunset and sunrise

Thaninan Aksornsart , Thailand
Phoxay Ngam Resort
8.4 Excellent
Based on 12 reviews

Tad Fane Resort
7.5 Very good
Based on 94 reviews

lovely staff who are extremely helpful a rather basic hotel located next to tad fane waterfall with stunning views of the falls.

i wish we had arrived earlier to do the trek to the falls. food served at the resort is surprisingly good. i only wish they had spa facilities!

Show more
Sean Yeoh , Malaysia
Sinouk Coffee Resort
8.1 Excellent
Based on 52 reviews

Great place

Martha Cox , United States
Falls View Resort Tad E-Tu Pakxong
7.6 Very good
Based on 30 reviews

The Great manager and staff takecare very good and warmly,I'm confused about the trip routh and plan to Southern Laos.

The manager help and advice how to visit and transportation plan for me cleary and easy with the great sense of humor. The room big and clean with the fresh ozone and cool ,romance to stay with the water fall sound all night very good to relax and have a sweet dream all night .

Show more

Tadlo Lodge
7.6 Very good
Based on 54 reviews

Right next to a good river for swimming with elephants on the property, this was a great place to stay.

I would definitely recommend it to anyone traveling to tadlo!

Show more
Ava Hosseini , United States
Mekong Paradise Resort
7.5 Very good
Based on 58 reviews

Great place to stay with huge balcony overlooking the Mekong River and amazing views throughout the resort and very good food.

The place was completely empty of customers for some reason so had the resort totally to ourselves. Location is only 10 mins away from main centre of Pakse which doesn't actually have much to offer so was nice staying here in a sleepy paradise by the river. Definitely recommend staying here.

Show more
Mark Robbins , United Kingdom
Nam Ou River Lodge
6.9 Good
Based on 77 reviews

Best views right on the river. Staff were amazing as my husband was very sick and they went above and beyond to help us.

Highly recommend this place.

Show more
Danielle James , Australia
Sabaidee Valley Resort
8 Very good
Based on 35 reviews

Barchiang Golf & Resort
8.1 Excellent
Based on 8 reviews

Pha Xang Resort
7.2 Very good
Based on 51 reviews

i arrived by a very rustic bus from luang prabang and was happy to see the hotel located just across the street from the bus station.

as a solo woman traveler i was very comfortable during my 3 day stay at this hotel. the rooms are simple, but lovely as one entire wall is made of glass panels that overlook a tranquil manicured garden and the mist shrouded "xang" or "elephant" rock formation that gives the hotel its name. floor to ceiling curtains are hung for privacy. delicious lao food is available in an indoor/outdoor restaurant on site with a view of the ou river. very little english is spoken here, but the menu is written with english translation. bicycles are available for rent at the hotel and are a great means of transportation between nong khiaw "town center" and the hotel. it was wonderful to ride the bike back to the hotel at night after enjoying a massage or dinner in the main part of the town. it would have been a long dark walk back to the hotel without the bike. this hotel is not for the extreme budget traveler as there are many cheaper options available, but well worth the price.

Show more
erin quinn , United States
Saynamkhan River View
8.2 Excellent
Based on 1095 reviews

the hotel was the second branch on a center , new building with good shower staff friendly, good value on a night just 5 min to night market and restaurant, for one glass of wine choice chez matt lounge style and good wine

bruno docoulot , Thailand
Villa Chitdara
8.5 Excellent
Based on 317 reviews

just on e block from the meking, yet on a quiet street, villa chitdara was a wonderful pace from which to,enjoy luanf prbang.

then clean, comfortable room with a balcony overlooking their garden had air conditioning and a nice bathroom. breakfast on the patio in the garden consisted,of eggs cooked to,order, baguettes and other breads with great marmalade as well as coffee, tea, fresh juice and fresh cut fruit. the staff were solicitous and helpful with whatever we wanted. an easy walk took us to the night market ans a multitude of restaurants.

Show more
James Hudson , United States
Mountain View Riverside Boutique Hotel
7 Very good
Based on 150 reviews

Its the best time for me when i stay at Bountang Hotel. nice staff , good view :)

Krissanawat Damee , Thailand
Golden Lotus Place
9.1 Exceptional
Based on 225 reviews

The manager, Bill, was so accommodating and went out of his way for all the guests. Best breakfasts, excellent location and really clean rooms.

The best place, above and beyond in every way! I will be returning and telling all my friends about this place.

Show more
Wendy Benson , Canada
Villa Ban Lakkham

Show more Christie Dickenson , Australia Villa Nam Song 7.7 Very good Based on 172 reviews This small boutique hotel is a gem on the edge of the river Nam Song. Step outside the gate and a boat tour awaits you for a wonderful ride along the river. I went on walks but found my self coming back to the Villa to sit and enjoy the garden and view of the mountains. The staff is polite and the gardner has done a superb job with his plants. The owner is on site and helpful and the dining area is another wonderful spot to sit and watch the river pass by. By far one of my favorite places I have stayed. I felt safe as a singe woman traveler and that's very important to me. I would recommend Villa Nam Song as I myself will return as often as I possible! Show more Jinni Mitchell , United States Lao Spirit Resort 9 Excellent Based on 98 reviews We stayed for 3 nights and did two treks and elephant riding. with a local english speaking guide arranged by the hotel. The treks were absolutley wonderful, visiting villages, seeing masses of butterflies, local farms and animals. The guide was very very good and took the trouble to tell us a lot about the local people and farming. The hotel itself is more like an old fashioned colonial house, with low-key service from friendly local staff who are keen to improve their English and provide as good a service as they could. The food was excellent and the rooms were larger than we had expected, spotlessly clean and very comfortable. We had a verandah overlooking the river and up into the mountains. The traditional Thai massage was the best ever, done by a local girl on our verandah. This is a fantastic place and all the better for providing employment and opportunity for local people. A very beautiful location with a great view. the staff is very friendly and the service excellent. Would highly recommend this place. Show more Stijn Christiaan Vissers , Netherlands Nam Ou Riverside Resort 8.5 Excellent Based on 113 reviews This is the best resort I had stayed.Perfect manager,perfect staffs,perfect rooms.They are very nice. if you want to relax,it's the best resort. Show more JIANFENG HEI , China Mandala Ou Resort 10 Exceptional Based on 3 reviews Belmond La Résidence Phou Vao 9.2 Exceptional Based on 45 reviews This hotel is amazing! We had a Garden View Junior Suite and the view over the town / mountains – including the Mount Phousi temple – was wonderful. The room was massive with a lovely bath and private balcony, the bed was decorated with flowers on arrival and the nightly turn-down with Macaroons was a nice touch. We ate at the restaurant every night and the food and buffet breakfast were excellent. Of course the hotel is a bit out of town, but really there is no reason to leave the hotel (and the hotel shuttle bus is free and convenient). The spa lived up to its reputation – exceptional menu and the massages were great. Oh, and the infinity pool is lovely! Show more Ava Hosseini , United States Mekong Paradise Resort 7.5 Very good Based on 58 reviews Great place to stay with huge balcony overlooking the Mekong River and amazing views throughout the resort and very good food. Location is only 10 mins away from main centre of Pakse which doesn't actually have much to offer so was nice staying here in a sleepy paradise by the river. Definitely recommend staying here. Show more Mark Robbins , United Kingdom Nam Ou River Lodge 6.9 Good Based on 77 reviews Best views right on the river. Show more Danielle James , Australia Sabaidee Valley Resort 8 Very good Based on 35 reviews Barchiang Golf & Resort 8.1 Excellent Based on 8 reviews Pha Xang Resort 7.2 Very good Based on 51 reviews i arrived by a very rustic bus from luang prabang and was happy to see the hotel located just across the street from the bus station. as a solo woman traveler i was very comfortable during my 3 day stay at this hotel. the rooms are simple, but lovely as one entire wall is made of glass panels that overlook a tranquil manicured garden and the mist shrouded "xang" or "elephant" rock formation that gives the hotel its name. floor to ceiling curtains are hung for privacy. delicious lao food is available in an indoor/outdoor restaurant on site with a view of the ou river. very little english is spoken here, but the menu is written with english translation. bicycles are available for rent at the hotel and are a great means of transportation between nong khiaw "town center" and the hotel. it was wonderful to ride the bike back to the hotel at night after enjoying a massage or dinner in the main part of the town. it would have been a long dark walk back to the hotel without the bike. this hotel is not for the extreme budget traveler as there are many cheaper options available, but well worth the price. Show more erin quinn , United States Saynamkhan River View 8.2 Excellent Based on 1095 reviews the hotel was the second branch on a center , new building with good shower staff friendly, good value on a night just 5 min to night market and restaurant, for one glass of wine choice chez matt lounge style and good wine bruno docoulot , Thailand Villa Chitdara 8.5 Excellent Based on 317 reviews just on e block from the meking, yet on a quiet street, villa chitdara was a wonderful pace from which to,enjoy luanf prbang. then clean, comfortable room with a balcony overlooking their garden had air conditioning and a nice bathroom. breakfast on the patio in the garden consisted,of eggs cooked to,order, baguettes and other breads with great marmalade as well as coffee, tea, fresh juice and fresh cut fruit. the staff were solicitous and helpful with whatever we wanted. an easy walk took us to the night market ans a multitude of restaurants.
